siteMetadata.title: Osmosis
siteMetadata.subtitle: A science focused podcast hosted by Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris

frontmatter.title: Mini moon bonus episode (with special guest!)
frontmatter.description: In this impromptu bonus episode we discuss and explore 2024 PT<sub>5</sub>, the new 'second moon' which will accompany us through the cosmos for the next two months.

frontmatter.title: Cracking the Standard Model - The Higgs Boson & The LHC
frontmatter.description: In this episode, we tackle one of the most groundbreaking discoveries in modern physics â€“ the Higgs boson.

frontmatter.title: LK-99, Super Conductivity, and the future!
frontmatter.description: This week, we explore the exciting world of superconductivity and are late to the party discussing LK-99.

frontmatter.title: Behind the Magic - Exploring Disney's Hyperion Renderer
frontmatter.description: In this episode, we take a deep dive into the world of animation by exploring Disney's ground breaking renderer, Hyperion.
